scripts.gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
scripts.doc: rimraf docs && typedoc --entryPoints src/index.ts --excludeProtected --excludePrivate --out docs && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run lint && npm run clean && tsc -b tsconfig.json
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
